thread.section_title: Enlightium Academy Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Enlightium Academy | enlightiumacademy.com
thread.title: Jonathan Whitby
thread.title_full: Enlightium Academy reviewed by Jonathan Whitby

author: Jonathan Whitby
title: Jonathan Whitby
text: I am a student of ECA and I am not happy at all. The teachers don't care about the students when you ask for help they will send you to a website and that is it. ECA I am money taker don't fall for their tricks. ECA is a rip off you are better off at public school.
